mapper.sql: farm_id, sum_at, sow_ph, sow_cf, sow_start, sow_in, sow_dead, sow_weed_out, sow_sale, sow_other_out, sow_chg_farm, sow_end, sow_ph_start, sow_ph_mating, sow_ph_konghuai, sow_ph_pregnant, sow_ph_in_farm_in, sow_ph_reserve_in, sow_ph_chg_farm_in, sow_ph_wean_in, sow_ph_dead, sow_ph_weed_out, sow_ph_sale, sow_ph_other_out, sow_ph_to_cf, sow_ph_chg_farm, sow_ph_end, sow_cf_start, sow_cf_in, sow_cf_in_farm_in, sow_cf_dead, sow_cf_weed_out, sow_cf_sale, sow_cf_other_out, sow_cf_wean_out, sow_cf_chg_farm, sow_cf_end, boar_start, boar_in, boar_dead, boar_weed_out, boar_sale, boar_other_out, boar_chg_farm, boar_end, mate_hb, mate_dn, mate_fq, mate_lc, mate_yx, preg_positive, preg_negative, preg_fanqing, preg_liuchan, farrow_nest, farrow_all, farrow_live, farrow_health, farrow_weak, farrow_dead, farrow_jx, farrow_mny, farrow_black, farrow_sjmh, farrow_weight, farrow_avg_weight, wean_nest, wean_count, wean_avg_weight, wean_day_age, base_price_10, base_price_15, fatten_price, sow_ph_feed, sow_ph_feed_amount, sow_ph_medicine_amount, sow_ph_vaccination_amount, sow_ph_consumable_amount, sow_cf_feed, sow_cf_feed_amount, sow_cf_medicine_amount, sow_cf_vaccination_amount, sow_cf_consumable_amount, farrow_feed, farrow_feed_amount, farrow_medicine_amount, farrow_vaccination_amount, farrow_consumable_amount, nursery_feed, nursery_feed_amount, nursery_medicine_amount, nursery_vaccination_amount, nursery_consumable_amount, fatten_feed, fatten_feed_amount, fatten_medicine_amount, fatten_vaccination_amount, fatten_consumable_amount, houbei_feed, houbei_feed_amount, houbei_medicine_amount, houbei_vaccination_amount, houbei_consumable_amount, created_at, updated_at, version
mapper.select:
select ifnull(sum(mate_hb+mate_dn+mate_fq+mate_lc+mate_yx),0) as preFarrowCount, CONVERT(ifnull(sum(farrow_live)/sum(farrow_nest),0),DECIMAL(10,2)) as farrowAvgLive, CONVERT(ifnull(sum(farrow_health)/sum(farrow_nest),0),DECIMAL(10,2)) as farrowAvgHealth, CONVERT(ifnull(sum(farrow_weak)/sum(farrow_nest),0),DECIMAL(10,2)) as farrowAvgWeak, CONVERT(ifnull(sum(wean_count)/sum(wean_nest),0),DECIMAL(10,2)) as avgWeanCount, ifnull(sum(case when sum_at = #{startAt} then sow_start else 0 end),0) as sowStart, ifnull(sum(sow_in),0) as sowIn, ifnull(sum(sow_dead),0) as sowDead, ifnull(sum(sow_weed_out),0) as sowWeedOut, ifnull(sum(sow_sale),0) as sowSale, ifnull(sum(sow_other_out),0) as sowOtherOut, ifnull(sum(sow_chg_farm),0) as sowChgFarm, ifnull(sum(case when sum_at = #{endAt} then sow_end else 0 end),0) as sowEnd,
ifnull(sum(case when sum_at = #{startAt} then sow_ph_start else 0 end),0) as sowPhStart, ifnull(sum(case when sum_at = #{endAt} then sow_ph_mating else 0 end),0) as sowPhMating, ifnull(sum(case when sum_at = #{endAt} then sow_ph_konghuai else 0 end),0) as sowPhKonghuai, ifnull(sum(case when sum_at = #{endAt} then sow_ph_pregnant else 0 end),0) as sowPhPregnant, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_in_farm_in),0) as sowPhInFarmIn, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_reserve_in),0) as sowPhReserveIn, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_chg_farm_in),0) as sowPhChgFarmIn, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_wean_in),0) as sowPhWeanIn, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_dead),0) as sowPhDead, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_weed_out),0) as sowPhWeedOut, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_sale),0) as sowPhSale, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_other_out),0) as sowPhOtherOut, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_to_cf),0) as sowPhToCf, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_chg_farm),0) as sowPhChgFarm, ifnull(sum(case when sum_at = #{endAt} then sow_ph_end else 0 end),0) as sowPhEnd,
ifnull(sum(case when sum_at = #{startAt} then sow_cf_start else 0 end),0) as sowCfStart, ifnull(sum(sow_cf_in),0) as sowCfIn, ifnull(sum(sow_cf_dead),0) as sowCfDead, ifnull(sum(sow_cf_weed_out),0) as sowCfWeedOut, ifnull(sum(sow_cf_sale),0) as sowCfSale, ifnull(sum(sow_cf_other_out),0) as sowCfOtherOut, ifnull(sum(sow_cf_wean_out),0) as sowCfWeanOut, ifnull(sum(sow_cf_chg_farm),0) as sowCfChgFarm, ifnull(sum(case when sum_at = #{endAt} then sow_cf_end else 0 end),0) as sowCfEnd,
ifnull(sum(case when sum_at = #{startAt} then boar_start else 0 end),0) as boarStart, ifnull(sum(boar_in),0) as boarIn, ifnull(sum(boar_dead),0) as boarDead, ifnull(sum(boar_weed_out),0) as boarWeedOut, ifnull(sum(boar_sale),0) as boarSale, ifnull(sum(boar_other_out),0) as boarOtherOut, ifnull(sum(boar_chg_farm),0) as boarChgFarm, ifnull(sum(case when sum_at = #{endAt} then boar_end else 0 end),0) as boarEnd, ifnull(sum(mate_hb),0) as mateHb, ifnull(sum(mate_dn),0) as mateDn, ifnull(sum(mate_fq),0) as mateFq, ifnull(sum(mate_lc),0) as mateLc, ifnull(sum(mate_yx),0) as mateYx,
ifnull(sum(preg_positive),0) as pregPositive, ifnull(sum(preg_negative),0) as pregNegative, ifnull(sum(preg_fanqing),0) as pregFanqing, ifnull(sum(preg_liuchan),0) as pregLiuchan,
ifnull(sum(farrow_nest),0) as farrowNest, ifnull(sum(farrow_all),0) as farrowAll, ifnull(sum(farrow_live),0) as farrowLive, ifnull(sum(farrow_health),0) as farrowHealth, ifnull(sum(farrow_weak),0) as farrowWeak, ifnull(sum(farrow_dead),0) as farrowDead, ifnull(sum(farrow_jx),0) as farrowJx, ifnull(sum(farrow_mny),0) as farrowMny, ifnull(sum(farrow_black),0) as farrowBlack, ifnull(sum(farrow_sjmh),0) as farrowSjmh, ifnull(sum(farrow_weight),0) as farrowWeight, CONVERT(ifnull(sum(farrow_weight)/sum(farrow_live),0),DECIMAL(10,2)) as farrowAvgWeight, ifnull(sum(wean_nest),0) as weanNest, ifnull(sum(wean_count),0) as weanCount, CONVERT(ifnull(sum(wean_count*wean_avg_weight)/sum(wean_count),0),DECIMAL(10,2)) as weanAvgWeight, CONVERT(ifnull(sum(wean_count*wean_day_age)/sum(wean_count),0),DECIMAL(10,2)) as weanDage,
ifnull(sum(sow_ph_feed),0) as sowPhFeed, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_feed_amount),0) as sowPhFeedAmount, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_medicine_amount),0) as sowPhMedicineAmount, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_vaccination_amount),0) as sowPhVaccinationAmount, ifnull(sum(sow_ph_consumable_amount),0) as sowPhConsumableAmount,
ifnull(sum(sow_cf_feed),0) as sowCfFeed, ifnull(sum(sow_cf_feed_amount),0) as sowCfFeedAmount, ifnull(sum(sow_cf_medicine_amount),0) as sowCfMedicineAmount, ifnull(sum(sow_cf_vaccination_amount),0) as sowCfVaccinationAmount, ifnull(sum(sow_cf_consumable_amount),0) as sowCfConsumableAmount,
ifnull(sum(farrow_feed),0) as farrowFeed, ifnull(sum(farrow_feed_amount),0) as farrowFeedAmount, ifnull(sum(farrow_medicine_amount),0) as farrowMedicineAmount, ifnull(sum(farrow_vaccination_amount),0) as farrowVaccinationAmount, ifnull(sum(farrow_consumable_amount),0) as farrowConsumableAmount,
ifnull(sum(nursery_feed),0) as farrowFeed, ifnull(sum(nursery_feed_amount),0) as farrowFeedAmount, ifnull(sum(nursery_medicine_amount),0) as farrowMedicineAmount, ifnull(sum(nursery_vaccination_amount),0) as farrowVaccinationAmount, ifnull(sum(nursery_consumable_amount),0) as farrowConsumableAmount,
ifnull(sum(fatten_feed),0) as farrowFeed, ifnull(sum(fatten_feed_amount),0) as farrowFeedAmount, ifnull(sum(fatten_medicine_amount),0) as farrowMedicineAmount, ifnull(sum(fatten_vaccination_amount),0) as farrowVaccinationAmount, ifnull(sum(fatten_consumable_amount),0) as farrowConsumableAmount,
ifnull(sum(houbei_feed),0) as farrowFeed, ifnull(sum(houbei_feed_amount),0) as farrowFeedAmount, ifnull(sum(houbei_medicine_amount),0) as farrowMedicineAmount, ifnull(sum(houbei_vaccination_amount),0) as farrowVaccinationAmount, ifnull(sum(houbei_consumable_amount),0) as farrowConsumableAmount
from doctor_daily_reports where farm_id = #{farmId} and sum_at >= #{startAt} and sum_at <= #{endAt};
mapper.update: UPDATE SET sow_start = ifnull(sow_start, 0) + ifnull(#{liveChangeCount}, 0), `sow_end` = ifnull(sow_end, 0) + ifnull(#{liveChangeCount}, 0), sow_ph_start = ifnull(sow_ph_start, 0) + ifnull(#{phChangeCount}, 0), sow_ph_end = ifnull(sow_ph_end, 0) + ifnull(#{phChangeCount}, 0), sow_ph = ifnull(sow_ph, 0) + ifnull(#{phChangeCount}, 0), sow_cf_start = ifnull(sow_cf_start, 0) + ifnull(#{cfChangeCount}, 0), sow_cf_end = ifnull(sow_cf_end, 0) + ifnull(#{cfChangeCount}, 0), sow_cf = ifnull(sow_cf, 0) + ifnull(#{cfChangeCount}, 0) WHERE farm_id = #{farmId} AND sum_at >= date_format(#{sumAt}, '%Y-%m-%d')

UPDATE SET sow_ph_mating = ifnull(sow_ph_mating,0) + #{phMatingChangeCount}, `sow_ph_konghuai` = ifnull(`sow_ph_konghuai`,0) + #{phKonghuaiChangeCount}, `sow_ph_pregnant` = ifnull(`sow_ph_pregnant`,0) + #{phPregnantChangeCount}
WHERE farm_id = #{farmId} AND sum_at >= date_format(#{sumAt}, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.sql: ifnull(sum(sow_end),0) AS avgSowLiveStock, ifnull(sum(mate_hb),0) AS mateHb, ifnull(sum(mate_dn),0) AS mateDn, ifnull(sum(mate_fq),0) AS mateFq, ifnull(sum(mate_lc),0) AS mateLc, ifnull(sum(mate_yx),0) AS mateYx, ifnull(sum(preg_positive),0) AS pregPositive, ifnull(sum(preg_negative),0) AS pregNegative, ifnull(sum(preg_fanqing),0) AS pregFanqing, ifnull(sum(preg_liuchan),0) AS pregLiuchan, ifnull(sum(farrow_nest),0) AS farrowNest, ifnull(sum(farrow_all),0) AS farrowAll, ifnull(sum(farrow_live),0) AS farrowLive, ifnull(sum(farrow_health),0) AS farrowHealth, ifnull(sum(farrow_weak),0) AS farrowWeak, ifnull(sum(farrow_dead),0) AS farrowDead, ifnull(sum(farrow_sjmh - farrow_dead),0) AS farrowJmh, CONVERT(ifnull(sum(farrow_weight)/sum(farrow_live),0),DECIMAL(10,2)) as avgFarrowWeight, ifnull(sum(farrow_weight),0) AS farrowWeight, ifnull(sum(wean_nest),0) AS weanNest, ifnull(sum(wean_count),0) AS weanCount, CONVERT(ifnull(sum(wean_count*wean_avg_weight)/sum(wean_count),0),DECIMAL(10,2)) as weanAvgWeight, CONVERT(ifnull(sum(wean_count*wean_day_age)/sum(wean_count),0),DECIMAL(10,2)) as weanDayAge, ifnull(sum(sow_sale),0) AS sowSale, ifnull(sum(boar_sale),0) AS boarSale
